title: The Good Wife
description: (Part 1) Elizabeth Henson is the perfect wife and lives the perfect life. She’s married to a prominent attorney, lives in an enormous house and drives expensive cars. Neil, her husband knows how to spoil his lady, but she’s got a secret.When Neil’s away she slips into the identity of a sex hungry dominatrix. Her lust for men seems unquenchable, until Alexander comes along. Her new boy toy is just what she needs, but now that she’s found him does she even need her husband?
author: Saundra Flame
